trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> control renders HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""></xref> elements and inline styles, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_listitem" name="listitem" href=""></xref> elements and cascading style sheet (CSS) styles.
You use the MenuRenderingMode enumeration when you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.RenderingMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
The value that you assign to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.RenderingMode%2A> property determines how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control renders markup.
In ASP.NET 3.5 and earlier versions, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control uses HTML `table` elements and inline styles to control the appearance of the menu in a browser.
In ASP.NET 4 and later versions, by default the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control uses `listitem` elements and cascading style sheet (CSS) styles.
This enumeration is provided for backward compatibility.
In ASP.NET 4 and later versions, you can use this enumeration to specify that you want the menu control to generate markup the way it does in earlier versions of ASP.NET.

The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> control renders markup in the way it does by default for the version of ASP.NET indicated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility*> property of the control. If the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility*> property is `3.5`, this setting is equivalent to Table.
If the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility*> property is `4.0` or greater, this setting is equivalent to List.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> control renders markup by using list item (<xref uid="langword_csharp_li" name="li" href=""></xref>) elements and CSS styles.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> control renders markup by using <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""></xref> elements and inline styles.
